attributes.action: extension of freedom bus pass because of extended school leaving age
attributes.additional_details: Due to the government extending school leaving age, the freedom bus pass stops at year, so parents have to pay £520 a year rather then £100. Even if you are on benefits, the minimum you pay is £260 and this is in a lump sum. I propose an extension until pupils are legal allowed to leave school or compulsory training.

rejection.details: Concessionary travel for young people is offered on a local basis - the creator may wish to petition their local council on this.
